ratings.comment: The best Professor I have ever had, he goes out of his way to make sure students understand the material and his tests reflect that. He does not make it hard at all. You will actually learn the material and be able to apply it.

Michael is a caring professor & brilliant lecturer. The content is, by nature, tricky, but he does a good job of contextualizing everything, breaking it down and providing practice problems.  He takes student feedback into account and moves at a great pace. Michael takes his teaching seriously, but never too much to crack a joke. Great prof.

Michael is a phenomenal professor and I enjoyed his class. He cares a lot about his students learning real-world skills, not just teaching out of a book. Prints all handouts which is very convenient. If you can take a class with Michael, absolutely do so. By far a top-3 professor I've ever had here.

I really, really liked Gofman. He is super passionate about finance and this class, really cares about student understanding,  does a great job teaching the concepts and, more importantly for me, the applications of those concepts.  There are only 2 exams, & 9-10 group based assignments that are extremely helpful (but at times can be difficult).

I really enjoyed this class. Gofman is very knowledgeable in Finance, and goes a good pace. Made me laugh every once and a while. The best part about him is that he really wants his students to succeed in life. Take him if you can.

Professor Gofman is a great professor. Prints out the powerpoints for all the lectures to give to students. Really takes the time to make sure students understand the concepts. Also, doesn't just teach out of a textbook. He teaches really valuable, relevant topics. Lots of work, midterm was predictable and final was impossible, but curved .
